programme.title: The Voice In The Lake
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E01, When 31-year-old real estate appraiser Mike Williams mysteriously vanishes while duck hunting in the Florida swamps in December of 2000, authorities suspect he accidentally drowned. For sixteen years his disappearance remains a mystery.

programme.title: The Cuff Link/The Unluckiest Man
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E11, Police solve an old murder case with a painstaking examination of the tool mark on the plastic flex cuff that bound the victim's hands, and a 15-year-old murder case is finally cracked open.

programme.title: Murder by Moonlight
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E09, Easter Sunday of 1992, the body of missing woman Lisa Ziegert is found in a field. The investigation yields hundreds of leads but no true suspect. After more than two decades on ice, the case is revived.

programme.title: Killer on Campus / The Bow Hunter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E15, Thirty-two years after the killing of University of Michigan law student Jane Mixer, police use DNA found on her pantyhose to finally track down the killer.

programme.title: One Tough Mother
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E18, In July 1997, the brutal murder of 19-year-old Tiffany Johnston rocks the small town of Bethany, Oklahoma. DNA points to her killer over a decade later and leads investigators across state lines.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E19, Cops finally close in on a serial killer with the help of the Internet. And a drug trafficker jumps bail goes into the bike shop business and helps pioneer the sport of mountain biking while he's on the lam.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E21, A quarter of a century after the murders of two nurses, Canadian police suspect that a former Toronto cop committed the crimes. A blow to the head of a garbage collector in San Jose leaves strange markings.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E03, While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E07, A woman's fall from a cliff in the Grand Canyon leads police to uncover a series of grisly murders, and investigators smoke out a killer when they find crucial DNA evidence on his cigarette butts.

programme.title: The Boy And The Monster/Secret In The Cellar
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E02, In Portland, Maine a housewife disappears. One year later her body is unearthed in the cellar. I.R. unravels this cold case investigation from the inside out. With the help of science, police are able to uncover a blueprint of the crime.

programme.title: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E01, A kidnapper grabs 8-year-old Chad Choice from his home in Texas, then torments his parents with two ransom demands. The case goes cold until the parents receive a chilling package in the mail that contains a letter--and a skull.

programme.title: The Clock Strikes Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E16, When 23-year-old Tonya McKinley is found brutally murdered on New Years Day 1985, a little boy is left motherless. A family must wait 35 years for advancements in forensic science to finally catch a killer using familial DNA.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E14, It takes nine years and the work of cutting-edge forensic toxicologists to solve the murder of a medical examiner's wife. Then, a determined Alabama sheriff reopens the case of the deaths of two babies, hoping to get their mother to confess.

programme.title: The Bone Keeper
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E22, In December 1985, when human bones are discovered in the woods, it puts an end to the search for missing teen David Reed. David's skull fractures point to murder; but it will be decades before investigators can find his killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2004, Investigators in Virginia, probing the murder case of a sailor, seek the help of a forensic anthropologist from the "body farm" in the Great Smoky Mountains. Dr. William Bass became an expert on the human body's rate of decay by watching bodies.

programme.title: The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E04, In 1983, Navy seamen Sonny Grotton left base for a long weekend at home. But as he pulled into his driveway, a gunman killed him. And in 1993, former state trooper Doug Wright claimed his estranged wife shot and killed herself in their home.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E4016, DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer.

What The Deaf Man Heard, 19971123000000 +0000, After 20 years of pretending not to be able to hear or speak, a man breaks his silence to get revenge on the man who made his life miserable. Stars Matthew Modine, James Earl Jones, Bernadette Peters, and Frankie Muniz.

When Love Is Not Enough: The Lois Wilson Story, 20100425000000 +0000, Based on the true story of the enduring but troubled love between Lois Wilson, co-founder of Al-Anon, and her alcoholic husband Bill Wilson, co-founder of Alcoholics Anonymous. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.
The Boys Next Door, 19960204000000 +0000, Four mentally handicapped adult men and their burned out social worker who must break the news that he is leaving.

A Dog Named Christmas, 20091129000000 +0000, A developmentally-challenged young man is determined to prove to his family that he can care for a dog on his own. In his triumph, he inspires his father to love the new member of the family. Stars Bruce Greenwood, Linda Emond.

A Season for Miracles, 19981231000000 +0000, With a little help from an angel, Christmas miracles happen for a homeless family. Stars Patty Duke, Laura Dern, Carla Gugino, Lynn Redgrave, and Kathy Baker. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.
A Family Christmas Gift, 20191222000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Amber spends the holidays with her Aunt Dora and helps plan a Christmas Concert.

Redwood Curtain, 19950423000000 +0000, A story of an Amer-Asian girl, with the reluctant approval of her adoptive parents, seeks her natural father in the redwood forests of Northern California. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame.

Pictures of Hollis Woods, 20071202000000 +0000, Having run away from a succession of foster homes, a 12-year-old girl resorts to desperate measures to stay with the eccentric retired teacher who's made her feel like she's finally in the place where she belongs.

Plainsong, 20040325000000 +0000, Tom, a high school history teacher, is faced with raising two young sons after his wife leaves him. Maggie, a fellow teacher, tries to provide comfort and support. Gradually, they grow to need and depend on each other.

programme.title: Space Race
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E08, The Serakkin Warrick proposes to share his planet's technology with Earth in exchange for Carter helping him win a space race. Carter eagerly agrees and copilots the craft through a perilous obstacle course; but the race isn't without risks.

programme.title: Avenger 2.0
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E09, Dr. Felger creates a computer virus meant to disable Goa'uld-controlled worlds. When the program malfunctions and spreads throughout the Stargate network, O'Neill, Teal'c and Daniel are trapped off-world, with danger looming around the corner.

programme.title: Birthright
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E10, SG-1 encounters a race of women warriors whose survival depends on symbiotes harvested from Jaffa. Teal'c and SG-1 must convince the warriors' high priestess to put aside her fear of reliance on a life-saving drug before the Goa'uld destroy them.

programme.title: Evolution (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E11, SG-1 encounters a very advanced bio-engineered warrior endowed with super strength, created by Anubis. While the team sets out to locate the origin of this new foe, Daniel travels to South America in search of a device left on Earth by the Ancients.

programme.title: Evolution (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E12, Having found the location of the warrior base, Carter is assigned a recon mission to determine Anubis's plans. Meanwhile, O'Neill mounts a mission to South America to rescue Daniel who has been kidnapped by Honduran rebels demanding a ransom.

programme.title: Grace
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E13, Having sustained an injury during an alien attack, Carter awakens to find herself abandoned on the Prometheus and trapped. With only her subconscious as a guide, Carter must find a way out of the nebula before it destroys the ship and her way home.

programme.title: Fallout
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E14, Jonas Quinn returns to the SGC with news that Naquadria mines of Kelowna are not native to his world and are threatening to cause an explosion in the planet's core that will leave his home world uninhabitable and millions dead.

programme.title: Chimera
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E15, Daniel experiences strange dreams centered around his possible knowledge of the Lost City of the Ancients. Suspicious that Daniel's mind is being manipulated, the team must find a way to help him while keeping the secret from the Goa'uld.

programme.title: Death Knell
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E16, Carter flees from a super warrior with a piece of technology that may be the key to defeating Anubis's new army. Injured and unarmed, Carter must use all her training to stay alive, while O'Neill and Teal'c race to find her before it's too late.

programme.title: Heroes (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E17, When the Air Force sends a documentary crew to capture the historical importance of the Stargate program, the members of the SGC are resistant. Tensions rise when an emergency forces General Hammond to restrict the access they're given to the SGC.

programme.title: Heroes (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E18, Assigned the task of capturing the importance of the Stargate program, a documentary crew is given a true look at the heroic nature and family-like bond of the soldiers of Stargate Command, when a key member of the SGC is killed in action.

programme.title: Coup D'Etat
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E17, Col. Sheppard's team is urgently summoned to M1K-177, where Maj. Lorne's team has been attacked. When Sheppard and his unit arrive, however, all they find is a burned building containing charred bodies: presumably, Lorne and his men.

programme.title: Michael
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E18, Lt. Kenmore wakes up in the infirmary without his memory. He begins to think there is something wrong when his nightmares about being a Wraith seem to be more than real. His fears would be unfounded if not for the serum that turns Wraiths humans.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E19, Sheppard and the team visits the planet Taranis at the invitation of two leading citizens, Dr. Norina Pero and Chancellor Lycus, who want McKay to repair a failing shield generator at an Ancient base, and Ancient warship, they've discovered.

programme.title: Allies
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E20, Kenmore arrives back in Atlantis with a group of Wraith, in the midst of a civil war. Kenmore, hoping to leverage his knowledge of Atlantis against Sheppard and the team, suggests a trade; Beckett's serum, in exchange for keeping Atlantis hidden.

programme.title: No Man's Land
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E01, After their alliance with the Wraith backfires, the team must find a way to stop two Hive ships that are headed for Earth. Weir orders to attack and Sheppard is forced to rely on Michael to help him save McKay and Ronon, who are being held prisoners.

programme.title: Misbegotten
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E02, Successfully using the retrovirus to turn an entire hive ship of Wraith into humans the team returns to Atlantis with their prisoners in stasis. Weir continues to defend her leadership in the face of an independent review being conducted by the IOA.

programme.title: Intervention
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E009, Dylan's closest friends stage an intervention at Casa Walsh, where they beg him to enter rehab.

programme.title: The Dreams of Dylan McKay
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E010, As Dylan lies in a coma fighting for his life, he experiences a number of bizarre dreams involving Erica, his drug dealer, and his dead father.

programme.title: Hate is Just A Four-Letter Word
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E011, The campus erupts in controversy when an accused anti-Semite is asked to give a speaking engagement at the school.

programme.title: Up In Flames
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E013, Emily Valentine returns to Beverly Hills hoping to reunite with Brandon, and even his devotion to Kelly can't dampen the sparks that still burn between them.

programme.title: Injustice For All
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E014, The courts decide on a punishment for Steve, whose illegal rave resulted in the fire that almost took two lives.

programme.title: Christmas Comes This Time Each Year
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E015, After reading Erica's plea for help, Dylan leaps into action and hires a private investigator to help him track down her kidnappers.

programme.title: Sentenced To Life
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E016, While working off his community service Steve meets a victim of Alzheimer's Disease, whose life story inspires Steve to make the most of his own.

programme.title: Sweating It Out
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E017, A motorcycle road trip inadvertently leads Brandon and Dylan to an ancient Native American ceremony where the two friends learn valuable lessons.

programme.title: Hazardous To Your Health
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E018, Dylan and Valerie fly to Mexico, where they hope to rescue Erica and reclaim Dylan's inheritance.

programme.title: Little Monsters
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E019, Kelly distances herself from everyone that matters to her as Finley's hold on her grows stronger.

programme.title: Stormy Weather
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E021, Brandon seeks Dylan's help with both taking down Professor Finley's cult-like organization and reuniting with his girlfriend, but when it comes to Kelly all bets are off.

programme.title: Alone At The Top
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E022, As the new owner of the After Dark, Valerie uses her newfound leverage to force Ray to continue their affair. But Ray has never been one to follow orders.

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E023, The campus is in an uproar when an alleged rapist is released from custody. Despite his alibi, the students are sure that Lenny is responsible for the string of crimes on campus.

programme.title: Unreal World
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E024, A documentary for a class project reveals intimate secrets about the gang and threatens to tear apart some long-standing couples. Meanwhile, Jesse makes a confession to Andrea.

programme.title: A Song For My Mother
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E026, Ray is unhappy that David has come to Portland. David panics when he discovers that his mother was fired, no longer lives at her last known address, and hasn't cashed her alimony checks for months.

programme.title: Squash It
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E027, Steve and David organize a hip-hop night at the club to boost the sagging gate receipts. David asks Willie's nephew Juwan, a talented DJ, to join him onstage.

programme.title: Girls On The Side
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E028, Kelly becomes depressed after making the cover of Seventeen, as she fears that she will never regain her past looks.

programme.title: Brittany’s Call/Garage Door
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E355, A 7-year-old calls 911 when she's unable to awaken her father. A 5-year-old is pinned by an automatic closing garage door.

programme.title: Alaskan Whale/New Orleans Docu, Part 1
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E381, A group of people tries to free eight trapped whales. New Orleans police search for an armed robber on New Year's Eve.

programme.title: Twin Car Trauma/Dog Saves Cop
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E374, A 3-year old left in a car causes a serious accident. A Sheriff's Deputy and his K-9 partner search for a burglary suspect.

programme.title: Peanut Heimlich/Piggy Peril
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E302, Parents call 911 when their toddler begins to choke. A woman calls 911 when she sees flames at the house next door.

programme.title: Sewer Pug/Sand Embankment
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E368, A puppy falls through a crack in a sewer pipe and disappears. A boy is trapped by a sand avalanche he created.

programme.title: Fatal Attract/Philly Docu
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E135, An ex-boyfriend threatens and breaks into the home of a woman home alone with her children/ Firefighters in Philly are dispatched to a fire.

programme.title: Send in the Clowns/Dirt Bike Boy
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E319, A circus clown collapses backstage and stops breathing. A boy is injured while riding his dirt bike.

programme.title: Seattle Cop, Part 2/Digitalis Kid OD
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E240, Continuation of "A 22-year veteran officer shot in the chest during a routine traffic stop". A 2-year-old swallowed her grandmother's heart medicine.

programme.title: Ice Dive/Newark Docu
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E146, An ice rescue diver loses is airflow and loses consciousness/ On-scene visit with Newark's University Hospital, one of America's busiest trauma centers

programme.title: Repentent Drunk/5 Yr Old Home Alone
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E373, A drunk driver causes a head-on collision. A 5-year old girl calls 911 when she comes home to an empty house.

programme.title: Phoenix Aerovac/2 Yr Old Pool
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E270, Rescue 911 flies with a Phoenix Air Evac team. A child falls into a pool and has no pulse.

programme.title: Tampa Docu/Pond Boy
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E159, Police have an all-night showdown with a knife-wielding man holding his 4-year-old son. A six-year-old fishing at a pond slips into the water.

programme.title: Stabbing, Shooting/Fancy Dancer
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E264, William Shatner hosts re-enactments of real rescues.

programme.title: Snowboarder/Nurse’s Bathtub Baby
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E340, A snowboarder loses control and tumbles down a rocky ravine. A mother leaves her two small children in the bathtub and finds the 10-month old not breathing.

programme.title: Arlington/Santa
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E175, Train with more than 600 passengers has a head-on collision. A man dressed as Santa Claus rushes to help a child coking in the car next to him.

programme.title: Christmas Fire/San Francisco
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E361, A mother and her daughters are in their basement when a raging fire starts. Rescue 911 follows San Francisco EMTs on New Year's Eve.

programme.title: Furnace Fire/Logger’s Lament
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E229, A man and his children are severely burned when their water heater explodes. A lumberjack is pinned down by a huge falling log.

programme.title: Go Kart Girl/Freeway the Fawn
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E134, Two girls driving a go-kart are struck by a pickup truck / a pregnant doe is hit by a car on the interstate

programme.title: Teen Car, Part 2/Heatstroke Hiker
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E317, Teenagers lose control of their car and tumble down a ditch. A woman hiking collapses and falls unconscious.

programme.title: Burning Jeep/Gotta Get to School
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E144, A teenager girl's jeep is hit head-on and she needs to escape before it erupts into flames/ A 5-year-old finds their father unconscious

programme.title: Heart Attack/Runaway Box Cars
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E189, A woman notices the driver in front of her slump over his wheel. Two railroad boxcars get loose on tracks.

programme.title: Yellow Cab/Runaway Dogsled
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E152, While preparing for a dogsled ride with a 3-year-old, the dogs got spooked and ran off with the child.

programme.title: Pesky Python/Woman Car
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E172, A man discovers a 250 LB python living under his house. Good Samaritan helps pull a man out of a burning car.

programme.title: Suicide/Highway Hero

programme.title: Father's Day
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E17, Mitch receives a mysterious package his father had put together before he died. Mitch and his father never saw eye-to-eye, but this gift impacts Mitch more than he ever thought possible. Logan visits a hypnotist to deal with a past trauma.

programme.title: Fire With Fire
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E18, Andy, an old friend of Mitch, visits Baywatch to complete four days of lifeguard service in order to remain on the active roster. But Andy's strong-arm tactics do not sit well with the other lifeguards.

programme.title: Deep Trouble
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E19, Matt and CJ stumble upon a homeless man who shockingly turns out to be someone they know very well. Meanwhile, Mitch must rescue a boy's brother from drug smugglers so the boy can receive a life-saving transplant of his brother's bone marrow.

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E20, When testing out a new flying machine, Mitch spots a makeshift raft with a stranded woman in it. Mitch must help the Chinese woman find her sister. Back at headquarters, Matt and Garner deal with a beach robbery scam.

programme.title: The Runaways
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E21, Prominent British businessman Richard Branson visits Baywatch to perform several risky stunts, putting the lifeguards on high alert. Meanwhile, Mitch has to save one of Kaye's employees whose violent husband has come looking for her.

programme.title: Wet and Wild
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E22, Hobie is thrilled when the “Johnny Danger Stunt Show" comes to the beach, but Mitch finds Johnny has questionable morals and is worried Hobie may follow his example. Matt is accused of sexual harassment by bad girl lifeguard Neely.

programme.title: Trapped Beneath the Sea, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E01, Mitch considers a new career working with Garner as a private eye. Logan cheats on Caroline again. The explosion of an offshore oil rig endangers Stephanie, Cody, and Neely.

programme.title: Trapped Beneath the Sea, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E02, As the crippled oil rig sinks and floods with water, Cody, Neely, and Stephanie begin a desperate rescue effort to save the two young couples, and themselves, until the Baywatch lifeguards can arrive to help.

programme.title: Hot Stuff
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E03, Kaye Morgan asks Hobie to volunteer at a school for young blind children. Things take a dangerous turn when a huge brush fire traps Hobie and the blind children in the hills, and Mitch is the only one who can save them.

programme.title: Surf's Up
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E04, Caroline tries to stop her sister from making the worst mistake of her life. Cody and Neely rescue two surfers that fall ill due to a highly polluted beach. Mitch enlists the Beach Boys for a benefit concert to raise money to clean up the pollution.

programme.title: To Everything There is a Season
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E05, Mitch's mother arrives in town for a visit, and after some strange occurrences, he insists she sees a doctor. Meanwhile, Cody loses the motivation to continue his Olympic training and it is up to Stephanie to reinspire him.

programme.title: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E06, Stephanie, CJ, and Caroline go on a girls-only junior lifeguard trip to Catalina which turns dire when two of the girls get trapped in a flooded cave. Meanwhile, a woman who dies in a car accident bequeaths an odd inheritance to Mitch…

programme.title: Face of Fear
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E07, Hobie's new friend Isaac is an angry kid who will do anything to get his father's attention. His risky behavior is a problem for the lifeguards. Meanwhile, Caroline meets a jockey who has lost the will to race after an accident.

programme.title: Hit and Run
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E08, Logan borrows Cody's car without permission and has an accident, then lies to the police. Meanwhile, the Baywatch team settles an internal dispute with a paintball war and C.J. takes in an injured sea lion, causing problems with her roommates.

programme.title: Home is Where the Heat is
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E09, Matt Brody returns to Baywatch and ends up trapped on a yacht with Neely when a group of ruthless pirates takes hostages. Meanwhile, Joey's past may jeopardize her adoption by Mitch.

programme.title: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E10, Logan and Caroline’s relationship hits a new low when Caroline returns his engagement ring, but things change when a baby is left in Logan’s possession. Meanwhile, Cody must overcome yet another setback to his Olympic career.

programme.title: The Incident
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E11, Caroline blames herself for a teen's death in a fiery nighttime boating accident and goes through Critical Incident Stress. Pushing everyone away, Caroline begins partying to distract from her guilt. Can the team help her recover from her PTSD?
